bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Transitional certificate of authorization and operating permit grandfathered

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: In this section, former regulation means the Swimming Pool, Spray Pool and Wading Pool Regulations, B.C. Reg. 289/72.

A certificate of authorization issued under section 4 [certificate of authorization] of the former regulation is deemed to be a construction permit issued under section 5 of this regulation, and is valid until the earlier of

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the completion of the construction for which the certificate was issued, and
the date on which the certificate is surrendered, suspended or cancelled.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: An operating permit issued under section 6 [operating permit required] of the former regulation is deemed to be an operating permit issued under section 6 of this regulation, and is valid until the earlier of

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the expiration date as shown on the operating permit, and
the date on which the permit is surrendered, suspended or cancelled.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: This section is repealed one year after the date sections 5 and 6 of this regulation are brought into force.
